Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Damen
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Damen due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Damen due to a door problem on a train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #81 Lawrence buses (board at Lawrence)

Also, as a result of the delayed train, shuttle busses are requested from Kimball to Belmont to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
